skills.name: SPARE
desc: • Deal 2 hits of physical damage to a single target that increases based on your MR stat.
• 50% Chance to inflict Silence on the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: CHOKE
desc: • Deal 2 hits of physical damage to all enemies that increases based on your MR stat.
• Grant Reflect Shield to self and a random ally for 2 turns.

skills.name: SAP
desc: Drains HP from all enemies and grants it to allies every turn
